post: Planning your fall trips or holiday travel? Great news! The Bill of Rights Institute has partnered with TravelingToGive, a smart trip planning tool that gives back to nonprofits. By using our travel booking tool, you can make a direct impact on civic education. Visit  https://lnkd.in/epqqzbzz to book.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #travel

School debate should be free, fair, and honest, where all students and viewpoints are welcome. Incubate Debate's first competitive tournament of the season, Incubate. Fall, is now open for registration. Acquired earlier last month by the Bill of Rights Institute, Incubate is a rapidly-expanding school debate program. The partnership will give millions of new students access to school debate, while removing the polarizing partisanship affecting many school debate competitions today. Know a student who'd like to compete? Have them visit  https://lnkd.in/eDs_JsUn  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #studentdebate

Join Dr. Jane Kamensky, President of Monticello, as she reflects on her journey from academia to leading one of Americas most historic landmarks. In this compelling interview, Dr. Kamensky dives into Thomas Jeffersons complex and paradoxical legacy, his relationship with John Adams, and Monticellos pivotal role in promoting civil discourse. Discover how Monticello uses historical education and innovative visitor experiences to foster a deeper understanding of Jefferson's life and the American experiment. Watch Dr. Kamensky's interview here,  https://lnkd.in/eRCU5GjR  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #CDL2024

Bill of Rights Institute Announces Scholarships GPS as Sponsor of 2024-2025 MyImpact Challenge. Through the Bill of Rights Institutes MyImpact Challenge, students across the country learn about civics and constitutional principles, while creating projects to help support their communities. Now, those students are getting an assist from Scholarship GPS, an online platform that helps students learn how to find and earn scholarships. Visit  https://lnkd.in/eWmKycuM to learn more.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #MyImpactChallenge

As election season approaches, it can be an exciting opportunity for civic education, but it can also bring stress and anxiety, especially for students engaging in political discussions for the first time. The Bill of Rights Institute has partnered with Huddle Up, an expert in IEP therapy, SEL, and K-12 mental health services, to provide free downloadable resources, including regulation cards, breathing visuals, and break cards that educators can share with students navigating election stress. To access and download Huddle Up's free resources for managing election stress, visit  https://lnkd.in/e94EbExS  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #ElectionStress

Are you a Federal employee or retiree? Then GIVE HAPPY to the Bill of Rights Institute through the Combined Federal Campaign using charity code 36265. One of the great benefits of the CFC is that you can give though payroll deduction or through your retiree annuity, giving a little each pay period and supporting BRI's mission all year long.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #GiveCFC

The Bill of Rights Institute would like to thank Sappi for their generous donation to the Power of the Printed Word. Sappi is a global renewable resource company that uses every part of the tree to make every day more sustainable. To learn more about Sappi, visit  https://www.sappi.com/. Printers from across the country have been supporting the Power of the Printed Word. Read more about this initiative and the support BRI has received so far, here  https://lnkd.in/eAA2hHpr.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #PowerofthePrintedWord

Claim your 2025 Celebrating History Wall Calendar today! For a donation of $25 or more, you will receive a calendar that teaches and reflects on moments and people who have shaped American history. Each month highlights key historical events and important dates in our nations past that represent Founding principles and civic virtues that connect us as Americans. Visit  https://lnkd.in/eJtYG4_S to claim your calendar today!  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #2025calendar

Join Dr. Condoleezza Rice as she delves into the enduring experiment of American self-governance and the vital role of civil society in preserving our democratic institutions. In this insightful discussion, Dr. Rice emphasizes how young people can lead the charge in sustaining the foundations of our democracy. Watch here,  https://lnkd.in/gubwU4sh This video is part of the Bill of Rights Institutes Constitution Day Live 2024 program. This years theme, Built for This: Debate, Dialogue, and the Constitution, explores the structures and institutions that have kept our government stable, trustworthy, and protective of individual rights.. Missed Bill of Rights Institute's Constitution Day 2024? Watch here:  https://lnkd.in/gA-zn4w8  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #CDL2024

Are you a Federal employee or retiree? Then GIVE HAPPY to the Bill of Rights Institute through the Combined Federal Campaign using charity code 36265. One of the great benefits of the CFC is that you can give through payroll deduction or through your retiree annuity, giving a little each pay period and supporting BRI's mission all year long. Visit  https://givecfc.org/ and use code 36265.  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #GiveCFC

Education cause area provides a wide range of services including STEM, Early Education, Colleges & Universities, Continuing Education, Vocational Training, Educational Infrastructure & Facilities, Educator Training, Special Education, Study Abroad Programs, Social Sciences, and Cultural Studies. Donate to Education-supporting charities at U. S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM)‘s GiveCFC.org today to help make an impact.  #GiveCFC
